SELECT magorder.id as id, magorder.order_no AS orderNo, magorder.USER_ID AS userId, magorder.PERIODS as periods, magorder.state as orderState, magorder.applay_money as applayMoney, magorder.Examine_time as examineTime, magorder.loan_amount as loanAmount, magorder.service_fee as serviceFee, userwhite.card as card, userwhite.job as job, userwhite.realName as realName, userWhite.tel as tel, userwhite.contractorName as contractorName FROM mag_order magorder INNER JOIN ( SELECT appuser.id AS id, byxwhite.job AS job, appuser.idcard AS card, appuser.realname AS realName, appuser.tel AS tel, byxwhite.contractorName AS contractorName FROM ( SELECT bc.contractor_name AS contractorName, bwl.job AS job, bwl.card AS card, bwl.real_name as realName FROM byx_white_list bwl LEFT JOIN byx_contractor bc ON bc.id = bwl.contractor_id ) byxwhite INNER JOIN app_user appuser ON byxwhite.card = appuser.idcard where byxwhite.realName=appuser.realname ) userwhite ON magorder.user_id = userwhite.id
and appuser.realname like '%${param.realname}%'
and userwhite.contractorName like '%${param.contractorName}%'
and appuser.tel like '%${param.tel}%'
